artist: Sanford Biggers; Published by Peter Norton Family Christmas Projects, Pasadena, California
description: hockey puck-shaped black plastic device with smiling mouth in red and white on top; electrical components inside--may have been designed to blink or light up--requires 3 AAA batteries; also included:  two poems on plastic card, New Year's card with caricature of Gwen and Peter Norton by Fallin in envelope with sticker with image of three musicians in front of Christmas decorations, and two computer printed "Barak Obama and the 1st Family" stickers
title: Cheshire Smile
